appDescriptionmf.message: Extensions that provide various features on YouTube

appDescription.message: Advanced player features and bug fixes

audioCompressorDesc.message: Volume boost and dynamic range compression (50% ~ 200%)

pipModeDesc.message: Watch video in a small floating window (adds PIP button)

smallPlayerButtonDesc.message: Add a button for YouTube's right-click menu small player feature

floatingPlayerDesc.message: Continue watching with floating player while scrolling

floatingPlayerDescription.message: Continue watching with floating player while scrolling

floatingPlayerSizeDesc.message: Select the size of floating player

floatingPlayerSizeDescription.message: Select the size of floating player

floatingPlayerPositionDesc.message: Screen position where floating player appears

floatingPlayerPositionDescription.message: Screen position where floating player appears

noBugFixes.message: No bug fix features are currently available.

youtubeWorking.message: Most features are working properly on YouTube.

appDescriptionLong.message:
An extension that enhances YouTube's player features
and provides practical audio control functions

audioCompressorFeature.message: Audio Compressor - Volume boost and dynamic range compression (50% ~ 200%)

stereoPanningFeature.message: Stereo Panning - Adjust left/right audio balance (L/R)

pipFeature.message: PIP(Picture-in-Picture) - Watch video in a small floating window

floatingPlayerFeature.message: Floating Player - Continue watching with floating player while scrolling

codecSelectionFeature.message: Video Codec Selection - Choose from H.264, VP9, AV1

developmentText.message: Unlike complex YouTube extensions, this design focuses on performance and stability by carefully selecting only essential features.

manifestV3.message: Manifest V3 - Latest Chrome extension standard

modularDesign.message: Modular Design - JavaScript modules separated by functionality

webAudioAPI.message: Web Audio API - High-quality audio processing

memoryOptimized.message: Memory Optimized - Unused features are not loaded

youtubeCompatibility.message: YouTube Compatibility - Stable structure that responds to YouTube updates

extensionYouTubeOnly.message: This extension only works on YouTube.

youtubeTrademark.message: YouTube is a trademark of Google LLC

disclaimer.message: This extension is not officially affiliated with YouTube
